Text: Sun Devil Projet Final Cash Flow Estimate Alternative Analysis and Agua Fria National Monument Cc I have attached our revised Cash Flow Estimate for the Sun Devil Pipeline Project I have increased the overall estimate from to million based on increases to the cultural resources surveyreport cultural resources testing and mitigation agencypublic meetings coordination meetings project management environmental inspector management and environmental inspector subcontract tasks Substantial budget increases were made to the cultural resources and environmental inspection tasks I assumed that environmental inspectors would be required for each spread instead of the inspectors per spread that were assumed in the previous cost spreadsheet that Scott provided to you I also have attached the alternative analysis text and associated table for the Compressor Station to Cordes Junction AZ alternative ie I alternative and a telecommunication report regarding the complications associated with the potential crossing of the Agua Fria National Monument Please let me know if you have any questions regarding this information Thanks Final Sundevil Task Cashflowxls Alternative Analysisdoc GSimmonsteldoc Alternatives Analysis Tabledoc Jon D Alstad Permitting and Compliance Manager ENSR Corporation Prospect Parkway Fort Collins CO telephone ext fax The information contained in this communication is confidential and privileged proprietary information intended only for the individual or entity to whom it is addressed Any unauthorized use distribution copying or disclosure of this communication is prohibited If you have received this communication in error please contact the sender immediately It is our policy that emails are intended for and should be used for business purposes only This footnote also confirms that this email message has been swept by MIMEsweeper for the presence of computer viruses ENSR wwwensrcom
